zone.line: Panthea
Peace! Peace!-- a mighty Power, which is as Darkness
Is rising out of Earth, & from the sky
Is showered like Night, & from within the air
Bursts, like eclipse which had been gathered
sun- up
Into the pores of light & the bright Visions
Wherein the singing spirits rode & shone
Gleam like pale meteors thro' a watery mist
Ione
There is a sense of words upon mine ear--
Panthea
An universal sound like words... o list
Demogorgon
Thou Earth, calm Empire of a happy Soul,
Sphere of divinest shapes & harmonies
Beautiful orb! gathering as thou dost roll
The Love which paves thy path along the
skies
The Earth
I hear,-- I am as a drop of dew that dies!
Demogorgon
Thou Moon which gazest on the nightly earth
With wonder, as it gazes upon thee
Whilst each to men & beasts & the swift birth
Of birds, is beauty, love, calm, harmony
